aboutpara: I am a Software Engineer with a strong background in full-stack development, API technologies, and DevOps practices. With experience across various industries and technologies, I've contributed to projects ranging from banking systems to e-commerce platforms. I'm passionate about creating efficient, scalable solutions and continuously expanding my skillset in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
